text: Rayman is the title character of the Rayman video game franchise. He has no arms, legs and a neck. ==Development== Michel Ancel came up with the character because there were limits on the game's data. ==Portrayals== Rayman has been voiced by David Gasman and Billy West in the franchise. ==Reception== Rayman is considered one of the best Ubisoft characters thanks to the simple animation for him and his friendly attitude. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1995 Category:Fictional immortals Category:Rayman Category:Video game characters Category:Video game protagonists
title: Rayman (character)
